name: Motorcycle Shops and Dealers
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell new and used motorcycles, motor scooters, and
mopeds, and related parts, equipment, and accessories. Products for
sale may also include helmets and a limited selection of riding
apparel such as jackets, pants, hats, and gloves.
